meanings.sent1: The pretaped show played on the radio last night.
meanings.sent2: The pretaped interview was ready to be broadcast.
meanings.sent3: The pretaped message made everyone laugh at the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: Her pretaped performance was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The pretaped music filled the room with familiar melodies.

meanings.definition: To have recorded in advance on tape.
meanings.sent1: She pretaped her speech for the conference.
meanings.sent2: They pretaped the documentary to ensure it was ready on time.
meanings.sent3: He pretaped the instructions to avoid any mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The memories were pretaped in his mind, ready to be replayed.
meanings.sent5: The band pretaped their performance to perfection before the big show.
